import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../context/ShopContext'; import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' import all_product from '../Assets/all_product'; const CartItems = () => { const {all_products,cartItems,removefromcart}=useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removefromcart(e.id)}} alt="" />
})}
) } export default CartItems
